Package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov

Class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
        • infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous, EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer
    public class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
extends ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.

    That is, this class implements an AIS calculator using the KSG nearest-neighbour approach. This is achieved by plugging in MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov as the calculator into the parent class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, with:

    • The constructor step is either a simple call to #ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(), or else specifies which KSG algorithm to implement via ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov(int) or ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov(String);
    • setProperty(String, String) allowing properties for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.setProperty(String, String) (except MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_TIME_DIFF as outlined in ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String)). Embedding parameters may be automatically determined as per the Ragwitz criteria by setting the property PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD to AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_RAGWITZ, or as per the max. bias-corrected AIS criteria by setting the property PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD to AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_MAX_CORR_AIS (plus additional parameter settings for these).
    • Computed values are in nats, not bits!

    References:

    • J.T. Lizier, M. Prokopenko and A.Y. Zomaya, "Local measures of information storage in complex distributed computation", Information Sciences, vol. 208, pp. 39-54, 2012.
    • Ragwitz and Kantz, "Markov models from data by simple nonlinear time series predictors in delay embedding spaces", Physical Review E, vol 65, 056201 (2002).
    • J. Garland, R. G. James, E. Bradley, "Leveraging information storage to select forecast-optimal parameters for delay-coordinate reconstructions", Physical Review E, Vol. 93 (2016), 022221, doi:
    Author:
    Pedro AM Mediano (email, www), Joseph Lizier (email, www)
    See Also:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo, MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public void initialise​(int dimensions,
                       int k,
                       int tau)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialise the calculator for re-use with new observations. History length k, source and destination dimensions are specified here; all other parameters remain unchanged.

        All child classes must call this routine on this as the super class once they have finished executing their specialised code for their ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo.initialise() implementations.

        Specified by:
        initialise in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate
        Overrides:
        initialise in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        dimensions - number of joint variables in the system.
        k - history embedding length to be considered.
        tau - history embedding delay to be considered.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName,
                        java.lang.String propertyValue)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets properties for the AIS calculator. New property values are not guaranteed to take effect until the next call to an initialise method.

        Valid property names, and what their values should represent, include:

        • PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD -- method by which the calculator automatically determines the embedding history length (ActiveInfoStorageCalculator.K_PROP_NAME) and embedding delay (ActiveInfoStorageCalculator.TAU_PROP_NAME). Default is AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_NONE meaning values are set manually; other accepted values include: AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_RAGWITZ for use of the Ragwitz criteria (searching up to PROP_K_SEARCH_MAX and PROP_TAU_SEARCH_MAX). Use of any value other than AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_NONE will lead to any previous settings for k and tau (via e.g. ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo.initialise(int, int) or auto-embedding during previous calculations) will be overwritten after observations are supplied.
        • PROP_K_SEARCH_MAX -- maximum embedded history length to search up to if automatically determining the embedding parameters (as set by PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD); default is 1
        • PROP_TAU_SEARCH_MAX -- maximum embedded history length to search up to if automatically determining the embedding parameters (as set by PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD); default is 1
        • PROP_RAGWITZ_NUM_NNS -- number of nearest neighbours to use in the auto-embedding if the property PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD has been set to AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_RAGWITZ. Defaults to the property value set for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.PROP_K
        • PROP_KRASKOV_ALG_NUM -- which KSG algorithm to use, 1 or 2.
        • Any properties accepted by {@link super#setProperty(String, String)}
        • Or properties accepted by the underlying MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.setProperty(String, String) implementation.

        One should set MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.PROP_K here, the number of neighbouring points one should count up to in determining the joint kernel size.

        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous
        Overrides:
        setProperty in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of the property
        propertyValue - value of the property.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem with the supplied value).

      • preFinaliseAddObservations

        public void preFinaliseAddObservations()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Hook in case child implementations need to perform any processing on the observation time series prior to their being processed and supplied to the underlying MI calculator. Primarily this is to allow the child implementation to automatically determine embedding parameters if desired, and a default implementation is provided for this for the main two auto-embedding methods. Child implementations do not need to override this default empty implementation if no new functionality is required.
        Overrides:
        preFinaliseAddObservations in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
